description: This file defines an Angular HTTP interceptor function that adds an Authorization header with a Bearer token to outgoing requests if a token is available, and handles 401 Unauthorized errors by logging out the user.

methods.name: authInterceptor
methods.description: An Angular HTTP interceptor function that inserts the Bearer token into request headers and handles 401 errors by logging out.

ctags.name: authInterceptor
ctags.pattern: /^export const authInterceptor: HttpInterceptorFn = (req: HttpRequest<unknown>, next: HttpHandlerF/
